channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Hell of a story, isn’t it?’: My brother stole $500K from my ailing father. Can we get justice?
item.description: “That money was intended for my children.”

item.title: How a single tech heavyweight managed to pull the rug on gold and global markets
item.description: Panmure Liberum’s Joachim Klement says last week’s Microsoft jolt triggered a contagion effect across trendy assets.

item.title: Merck’s outlook for 2026 comes in lower-than-expected as pipeline faces make-or-break year
item.description: Merck’s stock falls as the full-year revenue and profit outlooks were below expectations.

item.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
item.description: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house.”

item.title: PayPal’s stock slides as disappointing earnings usher in a CEO change
item.description: PayPal just saw a major slowdown on a metric that’s closely watched by investors. Soon HP veteran Enrique Lores will be tasked with trying to turn the...

item.title: Investor Joe Terranova likes Merck despite pharmaceutical firm's move to lower drug price
item.description: Merck will report its earnings on Tuesday, offering insights into how its agreement to lower the price of its diabetes drug has impacted its business.

item.title: The AI trend can give dividend aristocrats a boost, Raymond James says
item.description: After years of underperformance, the tide could be starting to shift for dividend stocks, according to Raymond James.

item.title: Tuesday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The Dow Industrials climbed more than 500 points Monday, as traders managed to look past declines in gold, silver and bitcoin.

item.title: This chemical stock has the potential for a big turnaround higher, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton takes a look at the materials sector, including one stock that could break out soon.

item.title: Boring but beautiful — This real estate stock reporting Monday has room to run, says Jay Woods
item.description: Investor and trader Jay Woods said there's a good trading set-up in shopping mall owner Simon Property Group this week.

item.description: SelectQuote (SLQT) stock jumped 23% on January 12, 2026 after securing a $415M credit facility. Dive into the details, risks, benefits, and how simila...

item.title: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) Soars on Promising Inflammation Drug Data
item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...
